# Ancient Scripts Converter

ðŸ“œ A Python package for converting text to ancient writing systems

## Installation
```bash
pip install ancient_scripts
```

## Usage
```python
from   ancient_scripts import AncientScripts

converter = AncientScripts()

# Convert to Cuneiform
cuneiform_text = converter.cuneiform("Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù…")

# Convert to Hieroglyph
hieroglyph_text = converter.hieroglyph("Ø®Ø¯Ø§")
```

## Supported Scripts
- Cuneiform
- Egyptian Hieroglyphs
- Pahlavi script
- Manichaean script
- Linear B
- And more...
